data.route_analysis: Direct flights to Guatemala from major cities, bus services to nearby attractions.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best months for travel are September to November due to pleasant weather.
data.climate: Tropical climate with warm temperatures and occasional rain in the fall. Recommended to pack light layers and a raincoat.
data.culture: Rich Mayan heritage, vibrant local festivals, traditional handicrafts and cuisine.
data.attractions: Key attractions include Tikal National Park, Antigua Guatemala, Lake Atitl√°n, and the colorful markets of Chichicastenango.
